coverage_details.optical_frame: Frame Limit--SR2,000.00 (as part of optical limit)
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-authorisation required for VIP members for outpatient & in-patient services except where outpatient services have limits.
coverage_details.special_instructions: One full time delegate. Marketing Medium engagement package. Crown covered up to dental limit 5,000 SR for all classes. Dental: surgical extraction of a natural tooth, white filling and amalgam filling, root canal, gum treatment, wedge placement, X-rays, medications, subgingival curettage. Frame optical covered up to optical limit for all classes. Costs of implanting artificial joints such as knee and pelvis covered up to 50,000 SR. Life-threatening birth defects/malformations covered up to 50,000 SR. Suite covered up to 4,000 SR (VVIP), single covered up to 2,000 SR (VIP). Daily hospitalization outside network/KSA in emergency: VVIP 1,000 SR/day, VIP 600 SR/day. Obesity covered up to 20,000 SR. Accompanying expenses 150 SR/day. Ear piercing covered up to 300 SR. Allergy analysis/treatment and any related illnesses covered. Psoriasis covered. Reimbursement claims based on Alhabib prices. Dental & optical claims are not covered. Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit.
